articles: CUPERTINO — Apple Inc revealed on Tuesday that its streaming TV service will kick off Nov. 1 and cost $5.99 a month in Canada, as the tech giant reaches a turning point where it focuses as much on services as its hardware and software. Apple TV+ will be avai

titles: Apple’s streaming TV service to cost $4.99 a month, launch Nov. 1
McDonald’s gets closer to automated drive-thru with purchase of tech startup
